column4: He -should- be using the Radeon ones from the site, since they make ones for Linux.
the "Radeon" ones are the open source ones that dont support 3d very well arent they? The fglrx ones are the official ones
If they are installed from ATI's website, it should be fine. I used it, and I was able to run Direct3D 9 applications through WINE.
the ATI's website ones are the fglrx ones not the ones entitled "Radeon"
